Session 7 - 5/12/2025

Session Notes

Source: Campaign Source Notes.

Highlights

  • (Question: when we level up do we get those spell slots immediately or after a long rest - you can have the new ones but can’t switch your other spells until a long rest)
  • Homebrew Mechanics Overview - When you take a long rest you will have a dream which is an in-world event that DID happen. The outcomes narrated in the past DO impact the present world which you are playing in. A dream triggers a saving t...
  • RECAP: Party minus Oldyoungkenjamin but WITH librarian Dick were captured but teenagers … something about cult… fae magic called “The Wilderness” created the teenager into a hag. We dreamed then. Kiv was dropped off at a nunnery while he...
  • We take the antler queen’s crown which is a magic item. Kiv gets.
  • Bart puts the Antler Queen cloak in the magic bag of holding
  • We bind and gag the spellcaster of the bunch
  • We go to the antler queen’s tent to try and find Dick who was supposed to die today as well as the orb
  • Dick is NOT dead.. Dying tomorrow. Always dying tomorrow.
  • Dick asks to see the cards which we totally remembered to grab. Turns out it is the Deck of Many Things.
  • Oldyoungkenjamin and Bart are both going to draw two. Old Oz is scared.
  • Bart was cursed…-2 penalty to all saving throws
  • Oldyoungkenjamin gets expertise in Intimidation
  • Oldyoungkenjamin gets the Keep of Winter Melon from Dick who gave him the scroll that has a ton of monsters
  • Bart gets a rare or rarer magic weapon - Luck Blade (which gets rid of the previous curse as he attunes it walking to Argentown later)
